rotate_wheel.description: Rotate the lighter wheel to kindle the fire.

clean_wheel.description: Clean the lighter wheel to ensure smooth rotation.

press_button.description: Press the gas button to ignite the lighter.

clean_button.description: Clean the gas button to ensure proper functioning.

clean_lighter_body.description: Clean the lighter body to keep it neat.

check_lighter.description: Check the lighter for any physical damage.

use_lighter.description: Operate the lighter by rotating the wheel and pressing the gas button.

clean_whole_lighter.description: Clean the entire lighter including the wheel, button, and body.
